title: Romance: The Apocalypse
description: It is 36 pages long! Ignore all other info! This book satires the modern day "romance" novels! I am sick of seeing "throw a smile" or "pull a face"! My book will leave you ROTFL and LMAO and E-I-E-I-Oing! Enjoy it or don't, but you will definitely never forget...Romance...The Apocalypse!http://www.amazon.com/Romance-Apocaly...
author: Simon Simply
